title: 'The Handmaid's Tale' Returns, Plus Chvrches | The Watch (Ep. 252)
description:
The Ringer's Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald discuss the new trailer for 'Venom,' the movie starring the notorious Spider-Man villain, and and Tom Hardy's accent choice (3:00) before reviewing the first episode of Season 2 of 'The Handmaid's Tale' (8:30). Later, Andy interviews the band Chvrches about their new album, 'Love Is Dead,' and making an American record (22:00).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
